Dansguardian::GetConfFile ( $  conf,
$  group 
)

Returns configuration file of the module.

Certain modules have configuration divided into multiple pages/files, hence they override this method.

Parameters:
[in] $conf string Config type
[in] $group int Dansguardian group
Returns:
Config file pathname

Dansguardian::CreateNewGroup ( $  group  ) 

Creates a new web filter group.

Creates a new web filter group based on the active group for the current session.

Makes a copy of some of the configuration files listed in $filenames array. Missing files cause warnings, but are not fatal, so that restricted and privileged groups can be copied too.

References $_SESSION, _HELPBOX2(), _TITLE(), action, maxlength, method, and PrintHelpBox().

00078         // Print the group form even if group not found, so user can change it
00079         ?>
00080         <table>
00081             <tr>
